body: @zombieadd, I am can't agree more with that even the way of torture also keep repeating. amputee with regeneration power, rape by human and monster…… Sharashimono is great, Miko Yuki is good, so do the beginning of Physic agents. After that, I am not so impressed with AOki san work.

This repetitiveness and same "heroine gets overpowered easily by cheesy tentacles, raped, birth monsters/etc" generic fantasy/sci-fi plot formula is way overused and boring at this point. Except that scissor scene in ch1 which was a bit gory for some folks that can't handle it, it's pretty much yawning-worthy. Story gets to be fucking stupid, even those scrub employees are outright rubbing the maidens' face like a bunch of fucking little shit assholes that they are. Reading ch1 was already repulsive from lack of creativity, then came this ch2 and was like "yo, stop, seriously, same shit again". Art was alright but right now, this series gets a downvote from me, and fuck, I don't even like tentacles+rape any bit and gave this a chance, smh.

@Deepgazing1 Aoki san had lost his creative lost time ago. Dun you knew his story keep repeating? This series is the combination of physic agent and the miko. Too bad not much choice when talking about torture and blood without badly damage human beside him
Wow... This one turned my room into a sauna

Ugh this is the kind of comic where I both hate it and like it, I hate the idea of being Disposable if that makes any sense. I liked pretty much everything in this other than that, and the fact that those guys were total dumbasses. I am not sure if I am getting what I mean across. Of course, this is my two-cent opinion and me just voicing my thoughts, I don't have a problem with it existing, just wish there was a tag for what I am talking about
the books get less and less brutal now, and it's the same story each time. next story the non combatant gets easily beaten by some scrub generic demon, cursed, raped, and then gets "treatment"
This author lacks any creativity at this point. It's just the same shit over and over.
@Mast3r_Drag00n_Sux1 day,  because most of the human (real world or fantasy world) are demon in disguise
Why they helping the demons? It not going to end well
Feels like humans are the real monster in there world
